seo.title: Menu | Authentic Nepalese Cuisine & British Pub Classics | The White Horse Waterbeach
seo.description: Explore our menu featuring authentic Nepalese cuisine prepared with traditional recipes - Bhutuwa chicken, Pokhareli fish curry, Rara king prawns, momo - alongside British pub classics and cask ales. Takeaway available. Call +44 1223 921122.
seo.keywords: authentic Nepalese menu Cambridge, Bhutuwa chicken, Pokhareli fish curry, Rara king prawns, momo Cambridge, dal bhat, tandoori king prawns, curry Waterbeach, Baltis, Jalfrezis, pub classics, cask ales, collection & delivery Cambridge, takeaway Cambridge, Greene King IPA, Timothy Taylor Landlord

openGraph.title: Menu | Authentic Nepalese Food & Pub Classics | The White Horse Waterbeach
openGraph.description: Discover our interactive menu with search and dietary filters, combining authentic Nepalese cuisine with traditional British pub favorites at Waterbeach's historic thatched pub

hero.title: Our Menu: Authentic Nepalese Cuisine & British Pub Classics
hero.subtitle: Discover authentic Himalayan flavours prepared with traditional recipes alongside your favourite pub classics. From Bhutuwa chicken and Pokhareli fish curry to British favourites and well-kept cask ales.

sections.description: Experience authentic Nepalese cuisine prepared by talented chefs Ravi Acharya and Purna Man Bajrachaya, alongside traditional British pub favourites.
sections.allergenNotice: Please inform us of any allergies or dietary requirements when ordering.
